content: Thank you for confirming, Anshuli. I believe there might be a small mix-up. I’m actually looking for Ansuman regarding an important matter related to your SBI Bank credit card. Is that you?
It is me, and I do not have any credit card of SBI Bank.

I appreciate your clarification, Ansuman. However, I have some records indicating an outstanding credit card bill of ₹5115.0 linked to your account. This was associated with credit card number XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-1234 issued to you on [issue date]. 

Would you be open to reviewing this information further? I can help send you documented proof via email or postal mail if needed.
Okay. But this is my card, but I do not have any credit card amount pending.
So you should check your system twice.

I understand your frustration, Ansuman, and I apologize for any inconvenience this situation may cause. Let me assure you that I'm here to help resolve this. 

Our records show the outstanding amount of ₹5115.0. If you feel there's been an error, I can send you a detailed statement to review. Would you like me to send it to your registered email address, or would you prefer it via postal mail?
and I do not want to talk to you.

I completely understand that this situation is frustrating for you, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm here to help, and it’s important to me that we find a solution together.

If you decide you'd like to discuss this further later, please feel free to reach out. I will ensure that our efforts to resolve this remain respectful and professional. Thank you for your time, Ansuman.
Thank you. Bye bye. And do not call me ever again.
